name: Bulbasaur
flavorText:
A strange seed was
planted on its
back at birth. The plant sprouts
and grows with
this POKéMON.

next.name: Ivysaur
next.flavorText:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.flavorText:
A strange seed was
planted on its
back at birth. The plant sprouts
and grows with
this POKéMON.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.flavorText:
When the bulb on
its back grows
large, it appears to lose the
ability to stand
on its hind legs.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.flavorText:
The plant blooms
when it is
absorbing solar energy. It stays
on the move to
seek sunlight.
